<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="5"><font color="#24292f">百万剪辑师团队推出了一门全新的线上课程——</font><font color="#ff0000">《X站课堂：人人都能听懂的剪辑课》</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="5">无论你是剪辑新手还是有一定基础的爱好者，这门课程都将帮助你提升剪辑技巧，</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="5">制作出更加精彩的视频作品！以下是课程的详细信息：</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="5"><br>
